Title: Where am I connected?
Description: The purpose of this project is provide an easier way to test the behavior of the AlwaysOn Availability Groups connection response, using the listener.
HomeWiki:
SQL Server AlwaysOn Availability Groups - Where am I connected?
The purpose of this project is provide an easier way to test the behavior of the AlwaysOn Availability Groups connection response, using the listener.

The purpose of this project is provide an easier way to test the behavior of the AlwaysOn Availability Groups connection response, using the listener.

There are three kinds of possible tests:
  • Is the AG listener working as expected?
  • Is the read-only routing working?
  • The the end-user using the correct connection string?

From SQL Server 2016, connections using the Application Intent "ReadOnly" are distributed between the readable replicas based on Round-robin algorithm, this can be also tested using this application.
